document_data.name: Aerego Bethendur
document_data.mainbody: '''Aerego Bethendur''' was a businessman in [[Red Larch]] and a member of the [[Believers]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Aerego never asked about goods placed in his storage, even if they contained cadavers. It was only if they started to smell he would destroy them. He was a Believer, although his attendance was spotty and he was starting to wonder what exactly the mysterious priest [[Larrakh]] wanted from the village.
document_data.Activities: Aerego managed a storage place in the village.
